ProductInfo.Features:
When press door bell automatic take a photo and save it in system for master view late, Built-in flash memory for 300 pictures, automatic delete the first pictue if more then 300 picture.
7 inch TFT LCD full color Display,  Hands free video intercom, IR LEDs illumination for day and night, Suport Key-unlock
Up to 2 Video indoor monitors can be connected with 2 outdoor cameras
Additional SD Card for image storage: Automatic and manual mode can choice
ProductInfo.Name: Safeline Hands Free 2-Wire Color Video Intercom System with 300 photo recording, 7" LCD Monitor and Night Vision Security Camera
